local_intent: Perceive white_plate, open gripper, compute a top grasp into 'white_plate_grasp', approach and execute Pick, then verify grasp stability.
assumptions: white_plate within reachable workspace and visible
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase from GLOBAL_BT: detects the white plate, prepares the gripper, moves above, computes the top grasp into the same key used by GLOBAL_BT, approaches, performs Pick with retries, and verifies IsGraspStable.
